title: Kyuutei Gaka no Urusai Blanca
original_name: 宮廷画家のうるさい余白〈ブランカ〉
sinopse:
Set in the Baroque Spanish royal palace, a court painter is set to draw a portrait of His Majesty at the Minister's recommendation. However, while watching the royal art collection, he finds a woman who breaks a picture with a short sword.

(Source: MU)
